rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0001
rows.name:
When you walk around the Royal Capital,
you can see numbers of people dealing
with some kind of worry or problem.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0003
rows.name:
Iira is technologically advanced,
prosperous, and peaceful right now,
but...

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0004
rows.name:
it's only natural that the people living
there would have problems, big or small.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0005
rows.name:
I suppose that's just what
it means to be human.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0006
rows.name:
Even so, I can't overlook
people in trouble.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0007
rows.name:
It seems we still have time before
Metsu comes to the Royal Capital,
so let's do whatever we can.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0009
rows.name:
If we do that, the number of people who
will cooperate with Laura-sama and
Adel-sama will likely increase.

rows.label: campfev11_550_140_msg0010
rows.name: It certainly wouldn't be a waste of time.
